effect.Name: Photoshop Exclusion (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Creates an effect similar to but lower in contrast than the Difference mode. Blending with white inverts the base color values. Blending with black produces no change
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Photoshop Exclusion (Background) Shader | 1.2 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Creates an effect similar to but lower in contrast than the Difference mode. Blending with white inverts the base color values. Blending with black produces no change

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
